Package me.yleoft.zAPI.item

Class NbtHandler

java.lang.Object
me.yleoft.zAPI.item.NbtHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
DupeFixerListeners, ItemListeners
public abstract class NbtHandler extends Object
NbtUtils class to handle NBT operations on items.
